yaml.title: Using Callouts
yaml.subtitle: Use callouts to draw attention to important complementary content without interupting the document flow
yaml.description: Callouts are an excellent way to draw extra attention to certain concepts, or to more clearly indicate that certain content is supplemental or applicable to only some scenarios.
yaml.author: Charles Teague
